pages.text: $(li)The Scute is a rare item that can be used to craft new blocks like the $(l)Scute Shingles$(), $(l)Scute Pavement$(), or $(l)Scute Block$().$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:armors/turtle_shell)Turtle Shell$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)When baby $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/turtle)Turtles$(/l) grows, they maybe drop this item.
